Constructs a new distribution object.
@2@ Uses {{c|m}} and {{c|n}} as the distribution parameters.
@3@ Uses {{c|params}} as the distribution parameters.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|m|the ''m'' distribution parameter (degrees of freedom)}}
{{par|n|the ''n'' distribution parameter (degrees of freedom)}}
{{par|params|the distribution parameter set}}
{{par end}}
